#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
	
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	int a[n] ,counto=0,counte=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>a[i];
	}
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		
		if(a[i]%2==0)
		counte++;
		else if(a[i]%2==1)
		counto++;
	}
	
	int x=counte-counto;
	if(x>=0)
	cout<<x<<endl;
	else 
	cout<<-x<<endl;
	
	return 0;
}
